title: Bug 12428: Confusing message in Pull Up operation
description: When performing the Pull Up operation in the codebase, the message displayed is confusing. It should be 'Copy method 'void setUp()' FROM type 'TestCase'' (also with uppercase 'C' in 'Copy'). Another issue occurs when I select to delete the 'setUp' method from 'TestCase', I receive the message 'Delete method 'void setUp()' declared in type 'junit.framework.TestCase''.
OB: When performing the Pull Up operation, in the tree of changes, under the 'Assert' section, the message 'Copy method 'void setUp()' to type 'TestCase'' is displayed. Here, 'TestCase' is shown with its fully qualified name.
